briefTitle: A Clinical Trial Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of MC2-01 Cream
officialTitle: A Randomised, Multicentre, Investigator-Blind, Parallel-Group Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of MC2-01 Cream Compared to Vehicle and Active Comparator in Subjects With Mild-to-Moderate Psoriasis Vulgaris
summary: This trial is a randomized, investigator-blind, multicentre, vehicle- and comparator-controlled, parallel-group trial with the purpose of evaluating efficacy, safety and convenience of the MC2-01 cream.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With a Decrease in the Physicians Global Assessment (PGA) Score of Minimum 2 Points on a Scale From 0-4 From Baseline to Week 8
